DOC.criteria: Locally advanced metastatic cancer ; Able willing give write consent ; WHO performance status 0 , 1 2 ; Able willing undergo blood sample PK analysis ; Minimal acceptable safety laboratory value ; Negative pregnancy test female patient childbearing potential ; Able willing swallow oral medication .
